price: (3) That is because they believed, and then they disbelieved; so their hearts were sealed over, and they do not understand.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمۡ ءَامَنُواْ ثُمَّ كَفَرُواْ فَطُبِعَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمۡ فَهُمۡ لَا يَفۡقَهُونَ
